short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark and create your knowledge base on Duggup

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The easiest, fastest way to capture engineering blogs, articles, videos, and more.

Duggup’s Chrome extension is the easiest, fastest way to capture engineering blogs, articles, videos, and anything else you find on the web. With one click, the content you’ve collected appears across all your devices in a clean, distraction-free space—there to read when you’re ready, whether at home, at work, or on the go.

To save the content, just click the Duggup button in the toolbar and done.

You can now see the link you bookmarked on https://duggup.com
